name: Polybius (itch) (MagmaInc)
description:
Well, if you're looking for a game that'll take you on a wild ride through the cosmos, let me tell you, there's nothing quite like piloting your own spaceship through the solar system. Picture this: you're hurtling through space at breakneck speeds, dodging asteroids and blasting enemy ships out of the sky. The adrenaline is pumping, your heart is racing, and you feel like you're on top of the world.

In this game, you're not just a pilot, you're a hero. Your mission is to capture enemy bases and fight against other spaceships to protect the galaxy from the forces of evil. You'll need to use all your skills to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents, blasting them out of the sky with your lasers and missiles.
